name: Molly Montgomery
introduction: Molly Montgomery is a New York City based actress. Her first published play, Snakes I Have Known premiered at Theatre Row in the United Solo Festival. The following summer it opened to a sold out theatre in the International Fringe Festival. She has co-starred on Law & Order SVU in Theatre Tricks and appeared in numerous nationwide print campaigns in addition to multiple independent films such as Preoccupied. Molly thanks Charles daily for encouraging her to write more.
